refined_action_summary: Refine setup with a more open elbow angle and a stronger wrist coil in the backswing, while keeping full extension at impact

setup.refined_suggestion: Lift the racket and keep the shoulder relaxed so the elbow opens into a wider, more natural angle during setup

backswing.refined_suggestion: Add a deeper forearm rotation to create a stronger wrist coil before swinging forward, while staying controlled

power.refined_suggestion: Keep your current arm extension at impact, as it ensures solid power transfer

improvement_drills: Repetition drill focusing on finding a comfortable elbow opening in the setup
Repetition drill emphasizing smooth and elastic wrist coil in the backswing
next_steps: Record a new video after practice to review arm openness and wrist preparation
